attributes.action: have military cooks cooking for our services the civi cooks are terrible and is there only to make money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a former soldier from a military family since the catering has been put out to the public sector the quality of food is terrible. I went to my sons passing out parade and I could not believe the rubbish they had to eat.
When I was an NCO and we had passing out parades or family open days the Army Catering Corp really put on a great show of catering to display their skill in the kitchen. Food when I was a soldier was not 5 star but it was good and a good selection to choose from. These private catering companies are out to make a profit and standards drop when motivated by money.
